Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

this is not supposed to be a bug report yet, but I want you guys to keep your eyes open.

What I whitnessed was that 2 of my Kerbals popped when I wanted to take a Surface Sample from Eeloo.

Victim a) - Climbed to the Surface and puffed into Nirvana once he set a Foot directly from the ladder to the Surface

Victim - Flew via Jetpack from the Pod to the Surface und disassembled also.

Please keep on the lookout if this is only an Eeloo-Issue or if it happens on other Planets as well.

Too bad I took no Screenshots

Bill & Bop... I will always remember you... until you show up in the Astronaut Complex again

Edited December 26, 2013 by MalfunctionM1Ke
